title: Simplify UIMA Tutorial
description: I'd like to simplify the Solr UIMA tutorial by removing the files in solr/contrib/uima/src/resources/solr/collection1/conf, and putting the couple of lines of content into the wiki directly.  The files aren't used by the unit tests, and are not complete solrconfig/schema.xml files that you can drop in, so you go from the wiki to SVN, and then back.   Before I make these changes, I'd like to get some agreement from someone else!

comments.author: Eric Pugh
comments.content: I'd also like to reformat the solr/contrib/uima/README.txt to be similar to the solr/contrib/extraction/README.txt in that it gives a quick overview, but then points you to the wiki.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content:
I cannot find these files in the source anymore. Nor can I find them being there or having them removed.

Close?
